Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Capital City in 1981...
Had first career hit on 9/7/1983, off Kenneth Taylor (HAL)...
Injured on 4/23/1985 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...

Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/9/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $644,100 per year...
